title: About TELETEST
content:
If you are over 30(?) and know what pressing 340 on your TV used to do then you already know this is. If not then you probably think I'm terrible at designing apps.

Incidentally this is my first app, but it's supposed to look like this.

If you enjoy it and want to support then please consider donating whatever you can [here](https://buymeacoffee.com/teletest).

If you have any feedback, or, like me, will be up all night this winter and want to help with the scoring, then get in touch at teletestcricket@gmail.com
